title: First Steps
description: MANTIS must stop an evil crime lord who has stolen a deadly virus.

title: Tango Blue
description: MANTIS starts a weapons turn-in program; only to have the weapons stolen by a band of pirates.

title: Days of Rage
description: MANTIS must stop a group of young students from continuing in an experimental drug program.

title: Cease Fire
description: MANTIS discovers his ex-girlfriend is the target of an international assassin.

title: Soldier of Misfortune
description: A virtual reality soldier is on the hunt for MANTIS.

title: Gloves Off
description: MANTIS uncovers an organization which runs underground; to-the-death bloodsport matches.

title: The Black Dragon
description: MANTIS must use his high-tech superpowers against the dangerous warriors of the Yakuza.

title: To Prey in Darkness
description: MANTIS becomes the prime target of a sophisticated group of criminals.

title: Fire in the Heart
description: MANTIS searches for an arsonist after several local businesses mysteriously burn.

title: Thou Shalt Not Kill
description: Hawkins tries to control his rage against those who permanently disabled him. Part 1 of 2.

title: Revelation
description: The police force continues its attempt to hunt down the MANTIS. Part 2 of 2.

title: Through the Dark Circle
description: MANTIS must rescue Port Columbia when "The Men in Black'' plan to take over the city.

title: The Eyes Beyond
description: MANTIS is mysteriously thrown into the future and finds Port Columbia governed by a computer.

title: Faces in the Mask
description: MANTIS tries to track down a killer after many founding members of the Micropower Corporation die.

title: The Sea Wasp
description: Hawkins needs the MANTIS to save him after he falls under the spell of the notorious Dr. Marisa Savoy.

title: Progenitor
description: A crazy scientist kidnaps Miles and replaces him with a clone.

title: Switches
description: MANTIS must stop a mysterious presence that is living in the electronic wiring of Port Columbia.

title: The Delusionist
description: MANTIS must stop a traveling magician that uses a mind control machine.

title: Fast Forward
description: MANTIS faces a criminal who has the ability to move so fast he is invisible.

title: Spider in the Tower
description: MANTIS strikes back when Ruell the Spider is positioned to attack Port Columbia.

title: Ancestral Evil
description: Stonebrake needs help from the MANTIS when he brings to life an ancestor who goes on a killing spree.

title: Ghost of the Ice
description: Miles and John are stalked by a unseen predator. When Leora and Taylor come, they wind up hunted as well. The Mantis finds out the only way for to stop the creature might be to make the ultimate sacrifice.
